audiotemplate_discussion_question2::clip: Record sound from the place you asked your questions.
audiotemplate_discussion_question2::text: Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template investigates what can be done about a specific issue. Discussions work well for investigating issues with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
audiotemplate_discussion_question2::clip: What do you think should be done about the issue?
audiotemplate_discussion_question2::text: You may want to substitute the name of the issue you are focused on where you see \“the issue.\”
audiotemplate_discussion_question2::eval: Does your story offer good ideas about how to handle the issue?
audiotemplate_discussion_question2::clip: Record something that introduces the issue.
What do you think should be done about the issue?
Record a clear sound that represents the issue.
